meanings.definition: Poikilotherms: animals that cannot regulate their body temperature internally
meanings.sent1: Many reptiles are poikilotherms, meaning they depend on their environment to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study poikilotherms to understand how they adapt to different climates.
meanings.sent3: The poikilotherms at the zoo always seem to find the sunniest spots to bask in.
meanings.sent4: In a world of poikilotherms, the sun becomes the ultimate thermostat.
meanings.sent5: Children learn about poikilotherms in school by observing frogs and snakes.

meanings.definition: Poikilotherms: organisms that rely on external sources of heat to maintain their body temperature
meanings.sent1: Fish are poikilotherms, so their body temperature changes with the water around them.
meanings.sent2: Poikilotherms like lizards often sunbathe to warm up their bodies.
meanings.sent3: The poikilotherms in the pond enjoy soaking up the sun on lazy afternoons.
meanings.sent4: In a garden full of poikilotherms, the rocks become their favorite sunbathing spots.
meanings.sent5: The survival of poikilotherms in cold climates depends on finding warm hiding spots.
